channel.title: ::bank in wilderness
channel.description: i need to make it where everyone can do ::bank which i know how but i also need to know how to make it where you cannot bank in the wilderness which i have no idea how to do any help :S

item.title: ::bank in wilderness
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

[quote=“Newty, post:3, topic:317890”][quote author=deathschaos9 link=topic=414397.msg3050727#msg3050727 date=1260063043]

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("bank")) {
openUpBank();
if (isInWilderness) {
sM("you cannot bank in the wilderness");
}
}

[/quote]

That won’t work right ^

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("bank") && (!sInWilderness)) { openUpBank(); } else { sM("you cannot bank in the wilderness"); }[/quote]

That won’t work either. That will show the message ‘you cannot bank in the wilderness’ if you’re in the wilderness and you’re not using the bank command.

This will work:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("bank")) { if (!sInWilderness)) { openUpBank(); } else { sM("you cannot bank in the wilderness"); } }

Read full topic
